ygData.subject: Re: Twinking = Diablo = UO
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Explain, exactly, how does it affect you? You will go at your normal rate anyway, right? So why do you care if someone else goes at a higher rate than you?
ygData.messageBody:
Elkantar The Wizard wrote:

> From: "Elkantar The Wizard" <the_elkantar@...>
>
> It does effect me and my
> character cause it will lead to every other player having to twinkle just to
> play on even ground.

Explain, exactly, how does it affect you? You will go at your normal rate
anyway, right? So why do you care if someone else goes at a higher rate than
you? So, tell me, are people who play all day long and get ahead while you are
left behind twinking too? Is it an offense to surpass you in any way?

Just give it a rest, the only harm done to you is that you are jealous and
pissed. That's not an offense.

--
Qenelin
